title: nAn enna tavam seidEnO
sahitya:
nAn enna tavam seidEnO yamunai nadit-turaivanin 
padattiNaiyil manam iruttiya palaril oruttiyena migha


anupallavi

  nAn enna tavam seidum nalladOr payanuTrum pADa nAvenna tavam seidadO 
kaNNanai nADippADi palamurai magizhndu uravADi Adi manamigha kashinduruga


caraNam    kaN sheida tavam ellAm kaNDadum uyndadE paN seida tavam ellm pADi 
magizhndadE patiyum nI nItiyum nI matiyum nI gatiyum nIyenavum 
paDameDuttADum kAlinga shirattil padamidittADum annaiyaip-pADavum
